details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 5 Version identification - rev prefix
details.description: Property rev of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfuaid

rule.description: Property rev of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfuaid

error.message: Property rev of the PDF/UA Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1
